Posts.Content: I am taking tamoxifen now. I will take if for 3 more years. After that my gynecologest wants me to take Evista. I am a survivor. I am pre-menopausal at this time so am not a candidate for the aromatase inhibitors. I also have had problems with osteopenia. deb
Posts.Title: cancer post treatment

Posts.Content: I started going bare about 8 weeks after my last chemo. I had hair that was about 1/2 an inch...it was cute....kinda! Be gutsy-Just do it! Hugs, Deb
Posts.Title: Time to Uncover?
